Text: why 480p... are u going to upload 720p also?
This is NOT 480p! 624x264 low resolution. Another wasted brrip! Come on guys, join the rest of us in the year 2011.

480p = 720x(480 or less in the case of widescreen)
720p = 1280x(720 or less in the case of widescreen)
1080p = 1920x(1080 or less in the case of widescreen)
p = lines of resolution, scanned progressively
Thanks for the upload, the file size is ideal for me. I don't want a 12Gig 1080p rip. Also I thought the film wasn't very good anyway.
